job_tasks.phrase: own and drive technical decisions to ensure the scalability, reliability, availability and security of our internal systems and enterprise revenue platforms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering responsibilities related to ensuring the quality attributes of systems, which falls under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: build, commission and deploy the technology and data infrastructure and architecture to meet business revenue growth objectives.
job_tasks.justification: Building and deploying infrastructure and architecture is a fundamental task in software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: defining a path to implementation, this role should ensure that product decisions and planning are carried out in a scalable manner.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring scalability in product decisions and planning is part of the software development lifecycle and process management.

job_tasks.phrase: challenge implementation, ensure execution alongside management and establish a collaborative path with other tracks in the engineering organisation.
job_tasks.justification: Challenging implementation, ensuring execution, and establishing collaboration are key aspects of software engineering leadership and teamwork.

job_tasks.phrase: Facilitate the overall architecture of our business systems across teams, system owners and engineers
job_tasks.justification: Facilitating architecture across multiple teams and stakeholders is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide guidance on the architecture and its components through the commissioning and decommissioning of all services involved
job_tasks.justification: Providing architectural guidance and managing the lifecycle of services are traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Ownership of revenue data management: Data architecture, governance, data protection, etc
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly refers to data management, architecture, and governance, which falls under Data Engineering & Management.

job_tasks.phrase: Provide hands-on technical leadership on projects with a size and scope of +5 teams
job_tasks.justification: Providing technical leadership on projects is a key responsibility within software engineering, especially at a principal level.

job_tasks.phrase: Helping teams plan and estimate activities
job_tasks.justification: Assisting teams with planning and estimation is a standard part of the software development process and project management.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting and challenging a realistic roadmap with team leads and product managers, challenging timelines and providing predictability of deliverables to the business
job_tasks.justification: Engaging with roadmaps, timelines, and predictability is a core responsibility in software engineering project management and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Mentor, develop and coach other senior software engineers, engineering managers and business leaders
job_tasks.justification: Mentoring and coaching other engineers and leaders is a responsibility that falls under senior software engineering roles.

soft_skills.phrase: ensure the scalability, reliability, availability and security
establish a collaborative path with other tracks in the engineering organisation

joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.
Open communication, regular feedback: ... clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on core software engineering tasks such as architecture, system design, scalability, reliability, and leading engineering teams. It does not mention any AI/ML model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or related AI-specific technologies. The listed technologies are standard software development tools. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining responsibilities and technologies that align perfectly with a traditional software engineering role, with no indication of AI/ML involvement. This makes the classification unambiguous.
